textBox.richText: At the point where Gluck and his team have consulted all the research they have collated, they agree on their “educated, noncombative guess,” and proceed to digitally scan the film at 4K resolution to get ready for digital cleanup. The company’s preferred vendor for all their scanning and digital cleanup is DTS Digital Images (formerly Lowry Digital Images: http://www.dts.com/digital_images/movierestorations.php).
